name: Kingston Street, 1bd Service Dwtwn Financial Area*
description:
Located in Boston’s Financial District, this elegantly curved 26-story glass tower has the Rose Kennedy Greenway at its doorstep. The apartments are light-filled, airy and modern, with oversized windows, sleek finishes and wood throughout. The kitchen appliances are top-of-the-line and each residence has its own Bosch washer and dryer.

The space
Luxury building that offers superior doorman service, a fitness center with a yoga and Pilates area, a media center, and more. Located just steps away from Boston’s Financial District, and is easily accessible to other areas in the city.
